description: This file contains UI and runner sanity tests for a web application using Playwright testing framework.

methods.name: runner is operational
methods.description: A simple test to verify that the test runner is operational by asserting 1 + 1 equals 2.

methods.name: UI smoke (skips when REACT_APP_FRONTEND_URL is not set)
methods.description: A test that navigates to the front-end URL and checks if the URL is valid, skipping if the environment variable is not set.
